name: blink
info: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

name: blades_of_attack
info: Bonus:  +9 Attack damage

name: broadsword
info: Bonus  +18 Attack damage

name: chainmail
info: Bonus   +5 Armor

name: claymore
info: Bonus    +21 Attack damage

name: helm_of_iron_will
info: Bonus  \n +3 Health regeneretaion\n +5 Armor

name: javelin
info: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.

name: mithril_hammer
info: Bonus    +24 Attack damage

name: platemail
info: Bonus     +10 Armor

name: quarterstaff
info:
Bonus     +10 Attack damage 
 +10 Attack speed

name: quelling_blade
info: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.

name: ring_of_protection
info: Bonus     +2 Armor

name: stout_shield
info: Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: gauntlets
info: Bonus    +3 Strength

name: slippers
info: Bonus    +3 Agility

name: mantle
info: Bonus    +3 Intelligence

name: branches
info: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds

name: belt_of_strength
info: Bonus    +6 Strength

name: boots_of_elves
info: Bonus    +6 Agility

name: robe
info: Bonus    +6 Intelligence

name: circlet
info: Bonus    +2 Strength, +2 Agility, +2 Intelligence

name: ogre_axe
info: Bonus    +10 Strength

name: blade_of_alacrity
info: Bonus    +10 Agility

name: staff_of_wizardry
info: Bonus    +10 Intelligence

name: ultimate_orb
info:
Bonus  +10 Strength 
 +10 Agility 
 +10 Intelligence

name: gloves
info: Bonus Grants it's wearer +20 Attack speed

name: lifesteal
info: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

name: ring_of_regen
info: Bonus    +2 Health regeneretaion

name: sobi_mask
info: Bonus    +50% Mana regeneration

name: boots
info: Bonus    +45 Movement Speed

name: gem
info: Grants the wearer the ability of true sight thus reveling invisible units

name: cloak
info: Bonus    +15 Magic resistance

name: talisman_of_evasion
info: Bonus    +25% Evasion

name: cheese
info: Instantly restores health and mana.

name: magic_stick
info: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

name: recipe_magic_wand
info: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

name: ghost
info: Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.

name: clarity
info: Restores mana to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: flask
info: Restores health to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: dust
info: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

name: bottle
info:
Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. 
 If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.

name: ward_observer
info:
Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. 
 Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

name: ward_sentry
info:
Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes. 
 Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero

name: tango
info:
Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health. 
 Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

name: tango_single
info:
Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health. 
 Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

name: courier
info: summons an animal companion to carry items for you and your team

name: tpscroll
info: Teleports you to a friendly structure

name: travel_boots
info:
Bonus     +70 Movement Speed 
 Also gives it's wearer the ability to teleport to any friendly unit(except Heroes)

name: phase_boots
info: Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: demon_edge
info: Bonus    +24 Attack damage

name: eagle
info: Bonus    +25 Agility

name: reaver
info: Bonus    +25 Strength

name: relic
info: Bonus    +60 Attack damage

name: hyperstone
info: Bonus    +55 Attack speed

name: ring_of_health
info: Bonus:   +6 Health regeneretaion

name: void_stone
info: Bonus    +100% Mana regeneration

name: mystic_staff
info: Bonus    +25 Intelligence

name: energy_booster
info: Bonus    +250 Mana

name: point_booster
info: Bonus    +175 Health, +175 Mana

name: vitality_booster
info: Bonus    +250 Health

name: power_treads
info: Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence

name: hand_of_midas
info: Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

name: oblivion_staff
info: Bonus    +6 Intelligence, +75% Mana regeneration, +15 Attack damage, +10 Attack Speed

name: pers
info: Bonus    +6 Health regeneration, +125% Mana regeneration, +10 Attack damage

name: poor_mans_shield
info: Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.

name: bracer
info:
Bonus   +6 Strength,
 +3 Agility,
 +3 Intelligence,
 +3 Attack damage

name: wraith_band
info:
Bonus   +6 Agility,
 +3 Strength,
 +3 Intelligence,
 +3 Attack damage

name: null_talisman
info:
Bonus    +6 Intelligence,
 +3 Strength,
 +3 Agility,
 +3 Attack damage

name: mekansm
info: Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.

name: vladmir
info:
Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius. The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged. 
   Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack

name: flying_courier
info: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

name: buckler
info: Activte: Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

name: ring_of_basilius
info:
Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. 
 Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. 
  Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack

name: pipe
info: Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.

name: urn_of_shadows
info:
Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower. 
  Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

name: headdress
info:
Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius. 
 Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

name: sheepstick
info: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.

name: orchid
info: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%.

name: cyclone
info: Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

name: force_staff
info: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.

name: dagon
info: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit doing 400 damage

name: dagon_2
info: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit doing 500 damage

name: dagon_3
info: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit doing 600 damage

name: dagon_4
info: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit doing 700 damage

name: dagon_5
info: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit doing 800 damage

name: necronomicon
info: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.

name: necronomicon_2
info: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.

name: necronomicon_3
info: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3.

name: ultimate_scepter
info: Upgrades the ultimate and some abilities of certain heroes

name: refresher
info: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

name: assault
info:
Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.
 Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

name: heart
info: Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.

name: black_king_bar
info: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.

name: aegis
info: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

name: shivas_guard
info: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

name: bloodstone
info:
Bonus: gives the user 12 charges, Each charge gives increased manga and health regeneration. every assist or kill grants new charges, dying expends charges. 
 Activate: Instantly causes you to die.

name: sphere
info: Blocks most targeted spells once every 13 seconds.

name: vanguard
info: Makes the wielder block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: blade_mail
info: Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.

name: soul_booster
info: Bonus    +425 Health, +425 Mana, +50% Mana regeneration

name: hood_of_defiance
info: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.

name: rapier
info: Bonus    +330 Attack damage

name: monkey_king_bar
info: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.

name: radiance
info: When active, scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.

name: butterfly
info: Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4 seconds.

name: greater_crit
info: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

name: basher
info: Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

name: bfury
info: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.

name: manta
info:
Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds.
 Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.

name: lesser_crit
info: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

name: armlet
info: When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

name: invis_sword
info: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14 seconds.

name: sange_and_yasha
info: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: satanic
info: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.

name: mjollnir
info: Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

name: skadi
info: Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: sange
info: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4 seconds. The slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: helm_of_the_dominator
info: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 350. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

name: maelstrom
info: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets, dealing 120 magical damage to each.

name: desolator
info: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

name: yasha
info: Bonus +16 Agility, +15 Attack speed, +8% movement speed

name: mask_of_madness
info: Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but causes you to take extra 25% damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

name: diffusal_blade
info: If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4 seconds. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.

name: diffusal_blade_2
info: If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4 seconds. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.

name: ethereal_blade
info: Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack. Can be cast on self. If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage. Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.

name: soul_ring
info: Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

name: arcane_boots
info: Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.

name: orb_of_venom
info: Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

name: ancient_janggo
info: Gives bonus +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

name: medallion_of_courage
info: If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies. Armor reduction is halved against Roshan.

name: smoke_of_deceit
info: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

name: veil_of_discord
info: Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16 seconds.

name: rod_of_atos
info: Slows the target's movement speed.

name: abyssal_blade
info: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

name: heavens_halberd
info: Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets

name: ring_of_aquila
info:
Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect. 
 Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. 
 Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

name: tranquil_boots
info: Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.

name: shadow_amulet
info: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.5 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
